text: main tum mein aur un mein mazbooth hijaab bana deta hoon, mujhe loohe ki chaadare la do, yahaan tak ke jab un duno pahaado ke darmiyaan diwaar baraabar kardi, to hukm diya ke aag tez jalaao, ta waqte ye ke lohe ki in chaadaro ko bilkul aag kar diya, to farmaaya mere paas laao, is par phigla hoa taamba daal doon
